scripts.deploy: npm run build && NODE_ENV=production npm run server
scripts.dev: npm run clean && node ./bin/bundler/dev.js && concurrent "node ./bin/server/hotReload.js" "nodemon ./bin/server --watch dist -e js" --kill-others
scripts.heroku: git add . && git commit -m "commit message here" && git push -f heroku master && sudo heroku open
scripts.github: git add . && git commit -m "commit message here" && git push -u origin master && git rm -r --cached . && git add . && git commit -m "commit message here" && git checkout --orphan latest_branch && git add -A && git commit -am "commit message here" && git branch -D master && git branch -m master && git push -f origin master
